title: Baby Carrier
description: lined upper rectangular black panel; geometric embroidery and applied tape; 12 long/large tassels, red and green, suspended by knotted tape; lower panel of horizontal bands of scroll embroidery and tapes--reds, orange, blues, greens, white and black
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
